price: Allah çocuk edindi, diyorlar. Hâşâ! O bundan münezzehtir. Bilakis, göklerde ve yerde olanların hepsi O’nundur. Hepsi O’na boyun eğmiştir.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ وَلَدٗاۗ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥۖ بَل لَّهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ كُلّٞ لَّهُۥ قَٰنِتُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqālū ittakhadha al-lahu waladan sub'ḥānahu bal lahu mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi kullun lahu qānitūna
